creator: rollantz@rollantz.nl
text:
Hello, the manual says:  To load an element from file, right click on the
existing tree element to which you want to add the loaded element, and select
the "open" option. Ok, ... the open option is not there when I do this. I tried
Java 1.3.1_01 and Java 1.5.0.
Thanks for the report - Fixed in 2.1 branch
creator: sebb@apache.org
